items.sentence: Have you seen any of the Harry Potter movies?
Tom is going to be late if he doesn\'t hurry.
I don\'t really have much in common with Tom.
Mary usually wears her long hair in pigtails.
Tom wondered if he would ever see Mary again.
Tom wondered whether Mary liked taking walks.
Tom wondered whether what Mary said was true.
Tom didn\'t know how to express himself well.
Would you like me to get you a cup of coffee?
How many years have you been studying French?
Tom was a construction worker for many years.
Tom will get mad if you don\'t do that today.
How do you know that Tom isn\'t in Australia?
Tom isn\'t like anyone I\'ve ever met before.
Did you think that this was going to be easy?
Are there any good places to eat around here?
Does this have something to do with our work?
Would you like to know why I didn\'t do that?
I suspect Tom has finished doing that by now.
I suspect Tom will have to do that next week.
